messages.subject: Freeware For Kids!!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Everyone I thought you might like this site-  I can t wait until the little ones go to bed tonight so I can investigate this site thoroughly:-)
messages.messageBody:
Hi Everyone

I thought you might like this site- I can't wait until the little ones go to bed tonight so I can investigate this site thoroughly:-)

http://www.kidsfreeware.org/fun/toddlers-plus.html Freeware For Kids
Go to "find it", type in "educational" or whatever you're
interested in and a large selection of software for children is available
free by downloading it. I can't wait to let my toddler try Keyboard
Bangers!

Crystal
Homeschooling On A Budget
***********************************

Exchange time & money saving tips, low cost educational ideas, activities & resources
with homeschooling families interested in providing a quality education for less.
Subscribe today! HS-For-Less-subscribe@yahoogroups.com
Learn more about us at: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/HS-For-Less




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
